intro:
The project 'JALECOlle Famicom Ver.' is a series of consecutive releases of JALECO Famicom titles!
This time, a +α Special Ninja Mission: The Last Ninja!
description:
★A 9th-century ninja rampages through Manhattan!
Fueled by revenge and legacy, he crosses time and space to take on a trial-and-error style ninja action adventure!

【Game Story】
Late 20th Century — New York, Manhattan.
Once robbed of his comrades by the hand of General Kunitoki in the 9th century,
the lone ninja Armakuni finds himself hurled across time into this towering city.

From foreign city streets to underground sewers and high-security office buildings...
In a metropolis filled with traps and shadowy conspiracies, Armakuni walks alone,
driven by the pride of his discipline.

This is a trial-and-error style action adventure where you must discover hidden items and switches,
track down scattered keys, and proceed using precise control and intuition across each stage.

Spot the tricks, avoid the traps, and use your items wisely to carve out your path.
When all ninja missions are complete—
the name of the last ninja shall be etched into history.

- The Last Ninja ＜New Features＞ -
★ Weapon Shortcut
You can switch your equipped weapon with the L button.
★ Item Shortcut
You can switch your equipped item with the R button.
★ Weapon & Item List
Displays a list showing what you currently possess and what each item does.
★ Ninja’s Wisdom
While wandering within a stage for a certain amount of time, a notification will appear.
At that point, you can open “Ninja’s Wisdom” from the TIPS section in the menu
to view advice tailored to each tip that may help with your current mission.
This game features a fairly high level of difficulty.
If you find yourself stuck or unsure what to do next, it might be worth taking a look.

JALECOlle Common <New Features>
★Beginner-friendly rescue features
Now includes "Rewind" to quickly undo mistakes and "Quick Save & Load" to save and resume the game at any time.
★Record your best time
Now includes a "Simple Timer" to record the time from the beginning of the adventure to the defeat of the final boss. 
You can aim for your best time while using Quick Save. Take on the challenge seriously without any rescue features. 
Record your best time!
★Packed with many more enjoyable features and options!
- Now includes new achievements to challenge various in-game objectives.
- Explore the gallery page to view package designs, manuals, flyers and more from the original releases.
- Screen edge options to reduce screen distortion.
- Screen Filter option.
- Wallpaper options.
- Upon completing the main game, you'll unlock a special bonus feature as a reward.
